targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "swap" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(load1) / mean(n_cpus) as load1_by_cpu FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(load5) / mean(n_cpus) as load1_by_cpu FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(load15) / mean(n_cpus) as load1_by_cpu FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("offset") - 493 FROM "ntpq" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/  AND "state_prefix" = '*' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total") FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("zombies") FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total_threads") FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") as used FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/  AND "path" !~ /\/var\/lib\/docker\/.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "path"::tag , time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(result_code) as result_code FROM "http_response" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY server, method, time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(running) FROM "procstat_lookup" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY pattern, pidfile, systemd_unit, time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY cpu, time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(load1) / mean(n_cpus) as load1_by_cpu FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(load5) / mean(n_cpus) as load1_by_cpu FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(load15) / mean(n_cpus) as load1_by_cpu FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(used) as "used", mean(total) as "total" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("in")) as "in", non_negative_derivative(mean("out")) as "out" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(context_switches),1s)as "context switches"  FROM "kernel" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null) ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(processes_forked),1s) as forks FROM "kernel" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(null)
SELECT mean(entropy_avail) as entropy FROM "kernel" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(null)

SELECT mean(tcp_close) as CLOSED, mean(tcp_close_wait) as CLOSE_WAIT, mean(tcp_closing) as CLOSING, mean(tcp_established) as ESTABLISHED, mean(tcp_fin_wait1) as FIN_WAIT1, mean(tcp_fin_wait2) as FIN_WAIT2, mean(tcp_last_ack) as LAST_ACK, mean(tcp_syn_recv) as SYN_RECV, mean(tcp_syn_sent) as SYN_SENT, mean(tcp_time_wait) as TIME_WAIT FROM "netstat" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) ORDER BY asc

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_activeopens), 1s) as activeopens,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_attemptfails), 1s) as attemptfails,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) as estabresets,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_passiveopens), 1s) as passiveopens,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_retranssegs), 1s) as retranssegs,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_outrsts), 1s) as outrsts,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_inerrs), 1s) as inerrs
FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(udp_indatagrams), 1s) as indatagrams,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(udp_outdatagrams), 1s) as outdatagrams
FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(udp_incsumerrors), 1s) as udp_incsumerrors,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(udp_inerrors), 1s) as udp_inerrors,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(udp_noports), 1s) as udp_noports,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(udp_rcvbuferrors), 1s) as udp_rcvbuferrors,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(udp_sndbuferrors), 1s) as udp_sndbuferrors
FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(icmp_inechos), 1s) as inechos,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(icmp_outechos), 1s) as outechos,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(icmp_inechoreps), 1s) as inechoreps,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(icmp_outechoreps), 1s) as outechoreps
FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(icmp_inerrors), 1s) as inerrors,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(icmp_outerrors), 1s) as outerrors,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(icmp_incsumerrors), 1s) as csumerrors
FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(ip_inreceives), 1s) as inreceives,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(ip_outrequests), 1s) as outrequests
FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(ip_indiscards), 1s) as indiscards,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(ip_outdiscards), 1s) as outdiscards,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(ip_inhdrerrors), 1s) as inhdrerros,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(ip_inaddrerrors), 1s) as inaddrerrors,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(ip_inunknownprotos), 1s) as inunknownprotos,
  non_negative_derivative(mean(ip_outnoroutes), 1s) as outnoroutes
FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("ip_conntrack_count") as current, mean("ip_conntrack_max") as max FROM "conntrack" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s) as "in",
  non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s) as "out"  
FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$network_interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), interface  fill(none)

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(err_in),1s) as "in",
  non_negative_derivative(mean(err_out),1s) as "out"  
FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$network_interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), interface  fill(none)

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv),1s) as "in",
  non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent),1s) as "out"  
FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$network_interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), interface  fill(none)

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_in)) as "in",
  non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_out)) as "out"  
FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$network_interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), interface fill(none)

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read",
  non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" 
FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read",
  non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" 
FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read",
  non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" 
FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(io_time),1s) as "queued"
FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"
SELECT mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" !~ /\/var\/lib\/docker\/.*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "device", "path"
SELECT last("used_percent") as used FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/  AND "path" !~ /\/var\/lib\/docker\/.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "path"::tag , time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(inodes_used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" !~ /\/var\/lib\/docker\/.*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "device", "path"
SELECT mean("inodes_free") as free FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/  AND "path" !~ /\/var\/lib\/docker\/.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "path"::tag , time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT 
  last(blocked) as blocked,
  last(running) as running,
  last(stopped) as stopped,
  last(zombies) as zombies,
  last(dead) as dead,
  last(sleeping) as sleeping,
  last(unknown) as unknown
FROM "processes" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT 
  mean(running)
FROM "procstat_lookup" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY pattern, pidfile, systemd_unit, time($interval) fill(none)

SELECT 
  mean(cpu_usage)
FROM "procstat" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY process_name, pattern, pidfile, systemd_unit, time($interval) fill(none)

SELECT 
  mean(memory_usage)
FROM "procstat" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY process_name, pattern, pidfile, systemd_unit, time($interval) fill(none)

SELECT 
  mean(num_fds)
FROM "procstat" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY process_name, pattern, pidfile, systemd_unit, time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT last(result_code) as result_code FROM "http_response" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY server, method, time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean(response_time) as result_code FROM "http_response" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY server, method, time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("n_containers") as running, "server_version" as version FROM "docker" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("n_containers") as containers FROM "docker"  WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("n_images") as images FROM "docker"  WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(last(uptime_ns)) FROM "docker_container_status" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY container_name, time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("n_containers_running") as running FROM "docker"  WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("n_containers_stopped") as stopped FROM "docker"  WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("n_containers_paused") as paused FROM "docker"  WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(usage_percent) FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY container_name, time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean(usage_percent) FROM "docker_container_mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY container_name, time($interval) fill(none)

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(rx_bytes),1s) as "in",
  non_negative_derivative(mean(tx_bytes),1s) as "out"  
FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY container_name, network, time($interval)  fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=env
list.label: Environment
list.name: env
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=env

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host WHERE env =~ /$env/
list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host WHERE env =~ /$env/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$server/
list.label: Network Interface
list.name: network_interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$server/
list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$server/
